mods.abstract: Assuan from Nile River at Assuan; western style buildings of the City of Assuan along the Nile River, taken from a outcropping of rocks from the opposite shore, two boats moored at a dock (right middle ground); "Peridis e No 1135 Assouan" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
